export const getGeoCountryCode=async()=>{const res=await fetch("https://ipapi.co/json/");const data=await res.json();return data.country_code.toLowerCase();};// utils/translations.js
export const translations={ua:"Промокод",ru:"Промокод",us:"Promo code",gb:"Promo code",fr:"Code promo",default:"Promo Code"};export const getPromoText=code=>translations[code]||translations.default;
